config.EnableThisMod.name: Enable this mod.
config.EnableThisMod.description: On/Off setting of this mod itself.
config.ScaffoldPattern.name: Center Scaffold
config.ScaffoldPattern.description: The default setting is with the scaffold in the center. (more crab pod can be placed).
config.section.SettingSection_Mod_Katrie: This is an optional setting when the "Katrielle the Glitch NPC" mod is installed.
config.Mod_Katrielle_BridgePassage.name: Passable
config.Mod_Katrielle_BridgePassage.descr: If the area to the right of the beach is made accessible, the mod will also allow access to the road to the "Katrielle" house from the area added by this mod.
